definition: branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Every section should make out its own business trip expenses budget every year.
sentences.chinese: 每年以科级为单位制订出差费用预算。

sentences.english: This paper also proposes to carry out psychological treatment for the cadres.
sentences.chinese: 建议针对体育局机关科级干部开展心理卫生普及工作。

sentences.english: Differences indicate the occurrence of section-level bit errors.
sentences.chinese: 差异表明科级位错误的发生。

sentences.english: The new genus could be assigned to Myrmeleontoidea , but its exact systematic position was impossible to determine.
sentences.chinese: 新属可归于蚁蛉总科，但科级位置不能确定。

definition: main job/day job/steady full-time job (as opposed to temporary or casual)/chief or principal post (as opposed to deputy)
administrative unit (e.g. province 省[sheng3], prefecture 地區|地区[di4 qu1] or county 縣|县[xian4])
working hand/member of a work team/participant/(short form of 第一把手[di4 yi1 ba3 shou3]) the boss
temporary assignment to a Chinese government or CCP post
lit. to eat from government coffers/to serve as a government employee/to live off government money
